caption.p: SEM images of the nanofibers mats and different diameter distribution represent changes in morphology and nanofiber diameter of the HTCs mat due to its enriching with the capsaicin, AuNPs and their combination (capsaicin/AuNPs). ( A) HTCs, ( B) HTCs-capsaicin, ( C) HTCs-AuNPs and ( D) HTCs-capsaicin/AuNPs. (CA refers to capsaicin).
